select t.category_id,t.title,t.type,t.icon from wk_oa_examine_category t left join wk_oa_examine_sort a on t.category_id = a.category_id and a.user_id = #{userId} where t.is_deleted = 0 and t.status = 1
AND ( t.user_ids = '' OR t.user_ids LIKE concat( '%,', #{userId}, ',%' )) AND ( t.dept_ids = '' OR t.dept_ids LIKE concat( '%,', #{deptId}, ',%' ))
order by a.sort is null,a.sort,t.create_time
